1237110.name: Me and (My) Cat's Castle
1237110.description:
Stuff your cheeks with onigiri and make friends with everyone!

In "Me and (My) Cat's Castle", you control a character who transforms by stuffing their cheeks with onigiri. Take on the challenge of the "Cat's Castle" in this platformer!

Features

  • A protagonist who transforms by eating onigiri

  • Your interactions with onigiri and others change as you transform

  • Stages that offer a bit of a challenge

  • A 640x480 pixel world with 16x16 pixel characters

  • A prequel to "Me and (My) Cat's Island"

With just a D-pad and two buttons, "I" can jump, shoot, and eat the onigiri I stuff my cheeks with—that’s it! Master different behaviors in various situations, overcome gimmicks, clear stages, and take on the mysterious castle once again!

Streaming Guidelines
This game allows video streaming and monetization with no restrictions for both individuals and businesses.
